content:
6.4 release notes are ready for review: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10866

Feedback is welcome, of course! :heart:

Just a reminder to check out the draft of the 6.4 release notes. Here's a good way to preview them: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/blob/10853-6.4-release-notes/doc/release-notes/6.4-release-notes.md (or the PR above)

We're pretty sure we're done merging. Hopefully we'll release soon.
I reviewed the 6.4 Release Notes from my end - no issues to report back. Thanks
